mapper.insert: insert into ssafy_member(userid, userpwd, username, email) values(#{userid}, #{userpwd}, #{username}, #{email})
mapper.update: update ssafy_member set userpwd=#{userpwd}, username=#{username}, email=#{email} where userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into interest (aptCode, userid, apartmentName, lat, lng) values (#{aptCode}, #{userid}, #{apartmentName}, #{lat}, #{lng})
mapper.delete: delete from interest where userid = #{userid} and aptCode = #{aptCode}
mapper.select: select aptCode, apartmentName, lat, lng from interest where userid = #{userid}
